SELECT ps.id, ps.name, ps.email, ps.company, ps.role, ps.status, ps.event_id AS eventId, e.title AS eventName, es.start_time AS eventDateTime, ps.schedule_id AS scheduleId, ps.relationshipWithCompany, ps.bio FROM participant_speaker ps JOIN events e ON ps.event_id = e.id JOIN event_schedule es ON ps.schedule_id = es.id WHERE ps.id = #{id}
